alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 12:03PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following counties, Franklin and Wakulla. * WHEN...Until 315 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1203 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, St George Island, Apalachicola, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Yent Place, Lanark Village, Royal Bluff, St George Island St Pk, High Bluff, Green Point, Turkey Point, Mcintyre, Curtis Mill, Saint Teresa, Creels, Hays Place, Alligator Point and Beverly. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
